articles.description: There will be a significant police presence at the first East Lancashire derby in six years to tackle any fan trouble.
articles.content:
Police have released further details of the major operation being planned ahead of the Burnley FC and Blackburn Rovers derby this weekend.
Burnley host Rovers in a top of the table clash at Turf Moo… [+3068 chars]

articles.title: Richard Keys launches Trent Alexander-Arnold rant after fuming over Mikel Arteta - The Mirror
articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold was involved in a contentious incident during Liverpool's 2-1 win over Tottenham on Sunday and Richard Keys believes he was lucky not to be sent off
articles.content:
Richard Keys believes Trent Alexander-Arnold would have been sent off on the weekend if it were not for incompetent officiating by the video assistant referee.

articles.author: Alex Turk
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton not 'too happy' after FIA go back on promise made at start of the season - Express
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has admitted he was left unhappy with FIA after the governing body went back on a proposed change in the 2022 season.
articles.content:
He said: "We've had the same Thursday to Sunday for god knows how long.
"It was supposed to be a three-day weekend this year, and then they changed it back to four days, which I wasn't too happy abo… [+746 chars]
